name: Reflexes test
description:
#Reflexes test has topped the rankings as the best free apps on AppStore Japan.

This app measures your reflexes throughout several game mode.
It has single and multiplayer mode. (up to 4 players for ipad)

- [SINGLE MODE]

[NORMAL]
The normal mode.
1. Press the button until it lights up.
2. Lift your finger and press again as fast as you can
3. Your score is displayed

[LIGHT ONLY]
Normal mode with light only. (No vibration and no sound).

[SOUND ONLY]
Normal mode with sound only. (No vibration and no light)
Only sound audible. The auditory reflexes.

[Vibration ONLY]
Normal mode with vibration only (Iphone only)

[9-16-25 buttons MODE]
The board buttons lits one by one. Tap as fast as you can to get the best time possible.

[Game center functionality]
Your records are kept within game center.
You can compare your score with other players.
The best time is recorded each day. (Up to 50 days)


- [VS MODE]
Up to 4 player. (2 players on iPhone)

How to play:
- The way of playing is the same as the SINGLE MODE.
- Each player must hold button at the same time to start the game.
- Ranking is displayed as player press the buttons


※ Ver 7.1.1
- Layout have been updated for the recent iPhone and iPad.
- Added a premium functionality in order to disable advertisements
